price: ጌታህ ያዘነለት ብቻ ሲቀር፤ (ከመለያየት አይወገዱም)፡፡ ለዚሁም ፈጠራቸው፡፡ የጌታህም ቃል ገሀነምን ከአጋንንትና ከሰዎች ከሁሉም በእርግጥ እሞላታለሁ በማለት ተፈጸመች፡፡
arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ رَبُّكَۚ وَلِذَٰلِكَ خَلَقَهُمۡۗ وَتَمَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā man raḥima rabbuka walidhālika khalaqahum watammat kalimatu rabbika la-amla-anna jahannama mina al-jinati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
